Understate: The claim may understate the fact that Bill Gates has invested in several companies making meat replacement products, including Memphis Meats, which grows meat from living cells in a lab.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence that Bill Gates has worked specifically to end livestock production.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Bill Gates is pushing lab-grown meat without sufficient evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Bill Gates has invested in non-animal alt-protein companies and supports plant-based meat substitutes, but there is no evidence that he is working to completely end livestock production.
